images.caption: Figure 1:Pipeline of our Region-Aware Instructive Learning (RAIL) framework in Mean Teacher architecture. The total loss function for every student network in the training phase includes supervised lossesℒssubscriptℒ𝑠\mathcal{L}_{s}caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT,ℒD⁢F⁢Ssubscriptℒ𝐷𝐹𝑆\mathcal{L}_{DFS}caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_D italic_F italic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, and unsupervised lossesℒUsubscriptℒ𝑈\mathcal{L}_{U}caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_U end_POSTSUBSCRIPT,ℒTsubscriptℒ𝑇\mathcal{L}_{T}caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT,ℒC⁢A⁢Lsubscriptℒ𝐶𝐴𝐿\mathcal{L}_{CAL}caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_C italic_A italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

Figure 2:2D segmentation visualization of different semi-supervised methods on FDDI+ (first line), FDDI-E (second line), 3D CBCT Tooth (third line) and CTooth (last line) dataset under 14%, 10%, 10% and 10% labeled, respectively.

Figure 3:3D segmentation visualization of different semi-supervised methods on FDDI+ (first line), FDDI-E (second line), 3D CBCT Tooth (third line) and CTooth (last line) dataset under 14%, 10%, 10% and 10% labeled, respectively.
